<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules">

        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>false</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>

        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Update Gauge/Widget</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[updateGaugeName();

function updateGaugeName(){
 
 var newTitle = current.chart_title;
 if (newTitle.nil())
  newTitle = current.title;
 
 var gauge = new GlideRecord("sys_gauge");
 gauge.addQuery("type", "report");
 gauge.addQuery("report", current.sys_id);
 gauge.query();
 
 while(gauge.next()) {
  var changed = false;
  if (gauge.title != newTitle) {
   gauge.title = newTitle;
   changed = true;
  }
  if (gauge.name != current.title) {
   gauge.name = current.title;
   changed = true;
  }
  if (gauge.tablename != current.table) {
   gauge.tablename = current.table;
   changed = true;
  }
  if (changed)
   gauge.update();
 }
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-09-21 07:47:28</sys_created_on>
